18 
19  DoubleWhitening::DoubleWhitening(Dvector &ParcorF, Dvector &ParcorB, Dmatrix &ErrF, Dmatrix &ErrB,
20  unsigned int OutputSize, unsigned int ExtraSize)
21  :
22  mBuffer(1),
23  mFirstCall(true),
24  mOutputSize(OutputSize),
25  mTotSize(ExtraSize + OutputSize),
26  mOrder(ParcorF.size()),
27  mParcorF(ParcorF),
28  mParcorB(ParcorB),
29  mErrF(ErrF),
30  mErrB(ErrB),
31  mStatus(0),
32  mEf(2, mOrder),
33  mEb(2, mOrder),
34  mWhitened(1, mTotSize) {
35  }
36 
37  DoubleWhitening::DoubleWhitening(LatticeView &LV, unsigned int OutputSize, unsigned int ExtraSize)
38  :
39  mBuffer(1),
40  mFirstCall(true),
41  mOutputSize(OutputSize),
42  mTotSize(ExtraSize + OutputSize),
43  mOrder(LV.GetParcorF()->size()),
44  mParcorF(*LV.GetParcorF()),
45  mParcorB(*LV.GetParcorB()),
46  mErrF(*LV.GetErrorForward()),
47  mErrB(*LV.GetErrorBackward()),
48  mStatus(0),
49  mEf(2, mOrder),
50  mEb(2, mOrder),
51  mWhitened(1, mTotSize) {
52  }
53 
54  void DoubleWhitening::init(LatticeView &LV) {
55  mOrder = LV.GetParcorF()->size();
56  mParcorF = *LV.GetParcorF();
57  mParcorB = *LV.GetParcorB();
58  mErrF = *LV.GetErrorForward();
59  mErrB = *LV.GetErrorBackward();
60  mStatus = 0;
61  }
62 
63  DoubleWhitening::~DoubleWhitening() {
64 
65  }
66 
67  void DoubleWhitening::SetData(Dmatrix &Data, double scale) {
68  mBuffer.AddPoints(Data, scale);
69  }
70 
71  void DoubleWhitening::GetData(Dmatrix &DWOutput) {
72  int F0 = mStatus;
73  int F1 = 1 - mStatus;
74  unsigned int t;
75  unsigned int End = mOrder - 1;
76 
77  mEf.clear();
78  mEb.clear();
79 
80  if (mTotSize > mBuffer.Size()) {
81  LogWarning("Not enough data points");
82  throw no_data_available("DoubleWhitening::GetData ->No data available");
83  }
84 
85 
86  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mOutputSize; i++) {
87 
88  mErrF(F1, 0) = mBuffer(0, i);
89  mErrB(F1, 0) = mBuffer(0, i);
90 
91  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mOrder; k++) {
92  t = k - 1;
93  mErrF(F1, k) = mErrF(F1, t) - mParcorF(k) * mErrB(F0, t);
94  mErrB(F1, k) = mErrB(F0, t) - mParcorB(k) * mErrF(F1, t);
95  }
96 
97  mWhitened(0, i) = mErrF(F1, End);
98  F0 = 1 - F0;
99  F1 = 1 - F1;
100  }
101  mStatus = F0;
102 
103  for (unsigned int k = 0; k < mOrder; k++) {
104  mEf(F0, k) = mErrF(mStatus, k);
105  mEb(F0, k) = mErrB(mStatus, k);
106  }
107 
108  /**********Lattice implementation on workspace***************/
109 
110  for (unsigned int i = mOutputSize; i < mTotSize; i++) {
111  mEf(F1, 0) = mBuffer(0, i);
112  mEb(F1, 0) = mBuffer(0, i);
113 
114  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mOrder; k++) {
115  t = k - 1;
116  mEf(F1, k) = mEf(F1, t) - mParcorF(k) * mEb(F0, t);
117  mEb(F1, k) = mEb(F0, t) - mParcorB(k) * mEf(F1, t);
118  }
119 
120 
121  F0 = 1 - F0;
122  F1 = 1 - F1;
123 
124  mWhitened(0, i) = mEf(F0, End);
125  }
126 
127  mEf(F0, 0) = mWhitened(0, mTotSize - 1);
128  mEb(F0, 0) = mWhitened(0, mTotSize - 1);
129 
130  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mOrder; k++) {
131  mEf(F0, k) = mEf(F0, k - 1);
132  mEb(F0, k) = 0.0;
133  }
134 
135 
136  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < (mTotSize - mOutputSize); i++) {
137  mEf(F1, 0) = mWhitened(0, mTotSize - i - 1);
138  mEb(F1, 0) = mWhitened(0, mTotSize - i - 1);
139 
140  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mOrder; k++) {
141  t = k - 1;
142  mEf(F1, k) = mEf(F1, t) - mParcorF(k) * mEb(F0, t);
143  mEb(F1, k) = mEb(F0, t) - mParcorB(k) * mEf(F1, t);
144  }
145 
146  F0 = 1 - F0;
147  F1 = 1 - F1;
148  }
149 
150  for (unsigned int i = (mTotSize - mOutputSize); i < mTotSize; i++) {
151  mEf(F1, 0) = mWhitened(0, mTotSize - i - 1);
152  mEb(F1, 0) = mWhitened(0, mTotSize - i - 1);
153  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mOrder; k++) {
154  t = k - 1;
155  mEf(F1, k) = mEf(F1, t) - mParcorF(k) * mEb(F0, t);
156  mEb(F1, k) = mEb(F0, t) - mParcorB(k) * mEf(F1, t);
157  }
158 
159  F0 = 1 - F0;
160  F1 = 1 - F1;
161 
162  DWOutput(0, mTotSize - i - 1) = mEf(F0, End);
163  }
164 
165  mBuffer.DelPoints(mOutputSize);
166  }
167 
168  DoubleWhitening& DoubleWhitening::Input(SeqViewDouble &Data) {
169  Dmatrix *in = Data.GetData();
170 
171  if (in->size1() != 1) {
172  LogSevere("DoubleWhitening: multichannels not implemented resize");
173  throw bad_matrix_size("Wrong Matrix size");
174  }
175 
176  SetData(*in, Data.GetScale());
177 
178  if (mFirstCall) {
179  mFirstCall = false;
180  mStartTime = Data.GetStart();
181  mSampling = Data.GetSampling();
182  }
183  return *this;
184 
185  }
186 
187  DoubleWhitening& DoubleWhitening::Output(SeqViewDouble &outdata) {
188  Dmatrix *out = outdata.GetData();
189  out->resize(1, mOutputSize);
190  GetData(*out);
191  outdata.SetStart(mStartTime);
192  outdata.SetSampling(mSampling);
193  outdata.SetScale(1.0);
194  mStartTime += mSampling * mOutputSize;
195 
196  return *this;
197  }
198

200 }
